document.docAuthor: Barabanov, Andrei V. & Ananjeva, Natalia B.
document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the available scientific species­group names for lizards of the genus Phrynocephalus Kaup, 1825 (Reptilia, Sauria, Agamidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of the available scientific species­group names for lizards of the genus Phrynocephalus Kaup, 1825 (Reptilia, Sauria, Agamidae)

heading.emphasis:
Phrynocephalus (Phrynocephalus) guttatus melanurus
Eichwald, 1831
comb. et stat. nov.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Phrynocephalus melanurus
Eichwald, 1831
: 186
. — Terra typica restricta: Kyzylkum sands near the Kurchum village left side of the Bukhtarminskoje vodokhranilishe, Eastern Kazakhstan .

Phrynocephalus caudivolvulus
var. incerta Bedriaga In
Nikolsky, 1905
: 475
. — Terra typica restricta: “Kreis Wernoje” [= vicinity of Almaty city, approximately
43 º 17 ' N
,
76 º 55 ' E
, Kazakhstan ].

Phrynocephalus kuschakewitschi Bedriaga In
Nikolsky, 1905
: 476
. — Terra typica restricta: “Sergiopolsky okrug” [= now Ajaguz, approximately
47 º 55 ' N
,
80 º 23 ' E
, Semipalatinsk Region, Kazakhstan ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
" Phrynocephalus salenskii
" Bedriaga, “ 1905 ” 1906 a: 167 ( nomen nudum ).

" Phrynocephalus haeckeli
" Bedriaga, “ 1905 ” 1906 a: 167 ( nomen nudum ).

" Phrynocephalus isseli
" Bedriaga, “ 1905 ” 1906 a: 167 ( nomen nudum ).

Phrynocephalus bergi
Elpatjevsky, 1906
" 1907 ": 51 . — Terra typica restricta: vicinity of the Malaykuduk village, Kazakhstan .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Phrynocephalus Salenskyi
Bedriaga, 1907
: 141
, 213. — Terra typica restricta: “Urungu Fluss” [= Ulungur River, Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, China ].

Phrynocephalus Isseli
Bedriaga, 1907
: 229
. ­ Terra typica: Desert in vicinity of Mt. Ssalburty (in Saur mountains of the Tarbagatay range, Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region), China .

Phrynocephalus Haeckeli
Bedriaga, 1907
: 237
. — Terra typica: Desert in vicinity of Mt. Ssalburty (in Saur mountains of the Tarbagatay range), in the Tarbagataï (= Tacheng County) district, northern Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, China .

Phrynocephalus Arcellazzii
Bedriaga, 1907
: 307
. — Terra typica: "Gaschun, in der Nähe von Gutschen in der Dschungarei" [= Qitai, (
44 º00' N
,
89 º 50 ' E
), Junggar Basin, Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, China ].

Phrynocephalus Grum­Grzimailoi
Bedriaga, 1909
: 420
. syn. nov. — Terra typica restricta: “Gutschen” [= Qitai County, Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, China ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Phrynocephalus helioscopus levis Kašċenko, 1909 : 122
. — Terra typica: “near the Karatalsky post in the Black Irtysh river valley” [= vicinity of the Karatal village, approximately
47 º 36 ' N
,
85 º 10 ' E
, Eastern Kazakhstan ].

Phrynocephalus bedrjagai Tsarevsky, 1926 : 214
. — Terra typica restricta: Zaissan Lake region, Eastern Kazakhstan .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Phrynocephalus albolineatus
K. Zhao, 1979
: 113
. syn. nov. ­ Terra typica: " 45 kilometers south of Tacheng County, Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, China ; 584 m elevation".

subSubSection.paragraph:
Phrynocephalus guttatus salenski
— Mezhzherin & Golubev, 1993 : 60 (unjustified emendation).
Distribution: from southern coast of Balkhash Lake in Kazakhstan eastward to North­Western China (Xinjiang Uyigur Autonomous Region).
